about_the_game:
From the halls of lost memories to a creepy confrontation, from innocent days to dark moments shrouded in mystery, the music box is the perfect accompaniment. Whether you want wonderment or sadness, need to creep out the player, or make them feel safe before things go wrong, composer Joel Steudler's seven music box tracks have you covered. Also includes seven very useful short melodic musical events!

FEATURES:

9 BGM music box tracks for your RPG!
7 ME music box music events: short melodies to punctuate a scene!
.ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
Royalty free music to use in RPG Maker or the engine of your choice

Tracklist:

Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Dream_Dance
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Enchanted_Entrance
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Innocent_Interlude
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Lilting_Lullaby
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Melancholy_Memory
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Nursery_Nightmare
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Spooky_Spells
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Nursery_Nighttime
Theme_-_Music_Box_-_Wandering_Wizard

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM

short_description: The distinctive tones of a music box can evoke creepy crawls, magical mystery, or childlike innocence. This collection of seven tunes and seven musical events can provide the perfect scene setter, putting the player in just the right mood.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese
